_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType

_a-0000eb0d-4479-8000-9cfa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_clauseInclusionAndExclusionLogicForClauseSet_wrapper

_a-0000ee01-ec73-8000-9e19-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_SP_EvaluateRules
_a-0000ee01-ec73-8000-9e19-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!inputs: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CONTRACT_TYPES",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"(value: { ri!contractType })
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CATEGORY",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "refCategory.refDataId",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_METHOD",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "refContractMethod.refDataId",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_ESTIMATED_DOLLAR_AMOUNT",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "estimatedDollarAmt",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_IS_EXISTING_VEHICLE",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "isExistingVehicle",
        indexDefault: false()
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_IS_AMEND_OR_MOD",
      value: or(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
          cdt: ri!clauseSet,
          field: "refCategory.refDataId",
          indexDefault: null()
        ) = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_AMENDMENT,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
          cdt: ri!clauseSet,
          field: "refCategory.refDataId",
          indexDefault: null()
        ) = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_MODIFICATION
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_PSC",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "pscCode",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_NAICS",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "naicsCode",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CO",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractingOfficer",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CS",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractSpecialist",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_COREP",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractingOffcrRep",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CONTRACT_START_DATE",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractStartDate",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CONTRACT_END_DATE",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "contractEndDate",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_CLAUSE_SET_TYPE",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "refType.refDataId",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_SET_ID",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: ri!clauseSet,
        field: "setId",
        indexDefault: null
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_REF_IDS",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"(
        value: {
          {
            contractType: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CONTRACT_TYPE_DATA,
            category: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_CATEGORY,
            method: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_METHOD,
            estDollarAmt: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_ESTIMATED_DOLLAR_AMOUNT,
            psc: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_PSC,
            naics: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_NAICS_CODE,
            co: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACTING_OFFICER,
            cs: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_SPECIALIST,
            coRep: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_OFFICER_REP,
            contractStartDate: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_START_DATE,
            contractEndDate: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CONTRACT_END_DATE,
            question: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTION_DATA,
            clauseSetType: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_DATA_CLAUSE_SET_TYPE,
            equals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
            notEquals: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_NOT_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
            is: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_IS_OPERATOR,
            isNot: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_IS_NOT_OPERATOR,
            before: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_BEFORE_OPERATOR,
            after: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_AFTER_OPERATOR,
            between: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_IS_BETWEEN_OPERATOR,
            greaterThan: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR,
            lessThan: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_LESS_THAN_OPERATOR,
            and: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_AND_OPERATOR
          }
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_storedProcedureInput"(
      name: "IN_EVAL_ID",
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: ri!evalId,
        replacementValue: generateuuid()
      )
    )
  },
  local!spResult: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_executeStoredProcedureForQuery"(
    dataSource: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_DATA_SOURCE,
    procedureName: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_SP_EVALUATE_RULES,
    inputs: local!inputs
  ),
  local!result: tostring(
    a!match(
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: local!spResult,
        field: "parameters.OUT_RULE_IDS.OUT_RULE_IDS",
        indexDefault: "0"
      ),
      whenTrue: fv!value <> "0",
      then: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: local!spResult,
        field: "parameters.OUT_RULE_IDS.OUT_RULE_IDS",
        indexDefault: null()
      ),
      default: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: local!spResult,
        field: "parameters.OUT_RULE_IDS",
        indexDefault: null()
      )
    )
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!result),
    "[0]",
    local!result
  )
)

_a-0000eb97-b2e8-8000-9d39-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_IBRValidationDisabled_wrapper

_a-0000e6d1-2aad-8000-9bdd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QE_getQuestionnaireAudits

_a-0000e6a4-3c85-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexWhere

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The modifierMaps should have the below structure
{
a!map(
field: <The field which needs to be modified>,
find: Optional when findRegex is provided - The value to find,
findRegex: Optional when find is provided - The regex search performed to replace the value,
replaceWith: The value to replace with. When left blank the find values will be removed,
instanceNum: The instance number to which replace. Use only when the find is passed,
replaceAllInstances: Default true - Determines whether all the instances need to be replaced
applyWhen: When false this map will be skipped
),
...
}
*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!modifierMaps),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!data,
    expression: reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer(data: _, modifierMap: _),
      fv!item,
      ri!modifierMaps
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      input: index(ri!data, ri!modifierMap.field, null)
    ),
    ri!modifierMap.applyWhen
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    ri!data,
    ri!modifierMap.field,
    a!match(
      value: ri!modifierMap,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find)
      ),
      then: error(
        "Only one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
      then: if(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum),
        error(
          "instanceNum should be null when passing a value to findRegex"
        ),
        regexreplaceall(
          ri!modifierMap.findRegex,
          ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
          ri!modifierMap.replaceWith
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find),
      then: rule!AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce(
        text: ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
        find: ri!modifierMap.find,
        replaceWith: ri!modifierMap.replaceWith,
        instanceNum: ri!modifierMap.instanceNum,
        replaceAllInstances: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!modifierMap.replaceAllInstances,
          default: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum)
        )
      ),
      default: error(
        "Alteast one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      )
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
AS_CO_UT_queryEntity

_a-0000e675-e3a8-8000-9bcb-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_BL_returnSmartMatrixColumnForRefClauses
_a-0000e675-e3a8-8000-9bcb-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*The rule returns all the possible combinations of columns*/
a!localVariables(
  local!contractTypeIds: tointeger(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_Filter(
        records: ri!contractTypeMaps,
        field: "isActive",
        value: true
      ),
      field: "contractType.contractTypeId"
    )
  ),
  if(
    or(
      ri!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_AMENDMENT,
      ri!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_MODIFICATION,
      toboolean(ri!clauseSet.isExistingVehicle) = true,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!contractTypeIds)
    ),
    null,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      array: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayValueMultiple(
        values: local!contractTypeIds,
        inArray: {
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_FP_SUP,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_CR_SUP,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_FP_RD,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_CR_RD,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_FP_SVC,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_CR_SVC,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_FP_CON,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_CR_CON,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_TM_LH,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_LMV,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_COM_SVC,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_DDR,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_AE,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_FAC,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_IND_DEL,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_TRN,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_SAP,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_UTL_SVC,
          cons!AS_GCM_CONTRACT_TYPE_ID_CP_CS
        },
        replacement: if(
          ri!returnRelationshipId,
          {
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpSup.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crSup.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpRd.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crRd.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpSvc.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crSvc.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpCon.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crCon.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.tmLh.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.lmv.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.comSvc.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ddr.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ae.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fac.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.indDel.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.trn.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.sap.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.utlSvc.refDataId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.cpCs.refDataId
          },
          {
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpSupId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crSupId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpRdId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crRdId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpSvcId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crSvcId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpConId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crConId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.tmLhId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.lmvId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.comSvcId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ddrId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.aeId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.facId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.indDelId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.trnId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.sapId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.utlSvcId,
            recordType!AS GCM R Clause.cpCsId
          }
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

0021e9c3-ee68-8000-61d3-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GCM Write Clause Set Related Details

_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter_Reducer

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectCdtByField

_a-0000e36c-7599-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_primitiveTypeCheckHandler

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnSingleTypeObject

_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter
_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fieldValuePairs,
    default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!filterType, default: "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ee15-bcab-8000-9e1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_BL_GetPreviousSetIdForAmendmentOrModification
_a-0000ee15-bcab-8000-9e1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!defaultValue(
  value: index(
    a!match(
      value: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails(
        returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
        useQueryRecord: true,
        excludeRelatedRecords: true,
        fields: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId,
        executeWhen: or(
          ri!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_AMENDMENT,
          ri!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_MODIFICATION
        ),
        additionalFilters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setNumber,
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!clauseSet.setNumber
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId,
            operator: "<>",
            value: ri!clauseSet.setId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refTypeId,
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!clauseSet.refType.refDataId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatusId,
            operator: "=",
            value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_STATUS_FINALIZED
          )
        },
        pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
          startIndex: 1,
          batchSize: 1,
          sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.validationDate,
            ascending: false
          )
        )
      ).data[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId],
      whenTrue: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(fv!value),
      then: fv!value,
      default: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails(
        returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
        useQueryRecord: true,
        excludeRelatedRecords: true,
        fields: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId,
        executeWhen: or(
          ri!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_AMENDMENT,
          ri!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_MODIFICATION
        ),
        additionalFilters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setNumber,
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!clauseSet.setNumber
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId,
            operator: "<>",
            value: ri!clauseSet.setId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refTypeId,
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!clauseSet.refType.refDataId
          )
        },
        pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
          startIndex: 1,
          batchSize: 1,
          sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
            field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId,
            ascending: true()
          )
        )
      ).data[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId]
    ),
    1,
    null
  ),
  default: 0
)

f28850a6-d0cc-4841-a587-a36a568d70a3.name: AS_GCM_UT_nullifyEmptyNestedCdtFields

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_sortCdt

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs

_a-0000eb85-3dbf-8000-9d30-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DetermineFarMatrixEvaluationBehaviour_wrapper

5f18e821-865e-464d-b974-57c20096c58f.name: AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches

_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_handler

_a-0000e3ff-a5bc-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValueMultiple

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  sort: ri!sort,
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "relationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!relationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetailsWithBatching
_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!relationIds: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!relationIds,
    default: index(
      rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
        entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
        pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: 1, batchSize: - 1),
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "setId",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!setId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "isActive",
            operator: "=",
            value: true(),
            applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        },
        selectionColumns: { "relationId" },
        logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        executeWhen: and(
          ri!executeWhen,
          or(
            any(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
              {
                ri!additionalFilters,
                ri!logicalExpression,
                ri!aggregation
              }
            ),
            a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!setId),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationIds)
          )
        )
      ).data,
      "relationId",
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!batches: rule!AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches(
    identifiers: local!relationIds,
    batchingSize: a!defaultValue(
      ri!batchingSize,
      cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_TINY
    ),
    returnType: ri!returnType,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo
  ),
  local!selectionColumns: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!selectionColumns,
    default: if(
      ri!onlyGetFieldsForWrite = true(),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
        array: {
          "relationId",
          "setId",
          "refClause.clauseId",
          "clauseTitle",
          "retainedClauseTitle",
          "alternateValue",
          "section",
          "refUsage.refDataId",
          "refUsage.refLabel",
          "refStatus.refDataId",
          "refAddedVia.refDataId",
          "effectiveDate",
          "validationAction",
          "retainedEffectiveDate",
          "refFormat.refDataId",
          "format.refDataId",
          "refReasonForRemoval",
          "justificationForRemoval",
          "isEditedViaEditClause",
          "isClauseUpdated",
          "isRemovedManually",
          "createdBy",
          "createdDatetime",
          "modifiedBy",
          "modifiedDatetime",
          "isActive",
          ri!selectAdditionalFieldsForWrite
        }
      ),
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!data: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!relationIds),
    {},
    a!flatten(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!batches,
        expression: if(
          and(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: local!selectionColumns),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!aggregation)
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_nullifyEmptyNestedCdtFields(
            cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
              type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause?list',
              value: rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
                entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
                entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
                returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
                pagingInfo: a!defaultValue(
                  value: ri!pagingInfo,
                  default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
                    startIndex: 1,
                    batchSize: count(fv!item.identifiers),
                    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "relationId", ascending: true())
                  )
                ),
                filters: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "relationId",
                    operator: "in",
                    value: tointeger(fv!item.identifiers)
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "isActive",
                    operator: "=",
                    value: true(),
                    applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
                  ),
                  ri!additionalFilters
                },
                selectionColumns: local!selectionColumns,
                logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                executeWhen: and(
                  ri!executeWhen,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers)
                )
              ).data
            )
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails(
            relationId: fv!item.identifiers,
            returnType: a!defaultValue(
              value: ri!returnType,
              default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
            ),
            executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers),
            aggregation: ri!aggregation,
            logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
            additionalFilters: ri!additionalFilters,
            pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
            triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
            sort: ri!sort,
            showInActive: ri!showInActive
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    data: local!data,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
    returnType: ri!returnType
  )
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
    values: ri!value,
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: a!flatten(ri!cdt),
      field: ri!field,
      indexDefault: null
    )
  )
)
